scripts.deploy: npm run push && npm run version:stable && clasp deploy --description "Production deployment $(date)"
scripts.deploy:triggers: npm run deploy && npm run trigger:install && echo "\n✅ Email processing deployment complete!\n"
scripts.deploy:webapp:
npm run push && echo "
🚀 Deploying web app...
" && clasp deploy --description "Web app deployment $(date)" && echo "
📱 Web app deployed successfully! Manual URL retrieval required.
"
scripts.deploy:all:
echo "
🚀 Deploying complete system...
" && npm run push && npm run version:stable && clasp deploy --description "Complete system deployment $(date)" && npm run trigger:install && echo "
✅ Complete system deployment finished! Both web app and email processing are active.
"
scripts.webapp:url: echo "\n📱 Getting web app URL...\n" && clasp run getWebAppUrl
scripts.webapp:open: echo "\n🌐 Opening Apps Script project for manual web app URL retrieval...\n" && npm run open
scripts.webapp:deploy-and-open: npm run deploy:webapp && npm run webapp:open
scripts.trigger:list: echo "\n⏰ Listing installed triggers...\n" && clasp run 'ScriptApp.getProjectTriggers().forEach(t => console.log("Function: " + t.getHandlerFunction() + ", Source: " + t.getTriggerSource()))'
